return.description:
Returns an ODBC result identifier or FALSE on failure.The result set has the following columns:
   
    TABLE_QUALIFIER
    TABLE_OWNER
    TABLE_NAME
    NON_UNIQUE
    INDEX_QUALIFIER
    INDEX_NAME
    TYPE
    SEQ_IN_INDEX
    COLUMN_NAME
    COLLATION
    CARDINALITY
    PAGES
    FILTER_CONDITIONThe result set is ordered by NON_UNIQUE, TYPE, INDEX_QUALIFIER,
   INDEX_NAME and SEQ_IN_INDEX.
